lyrics.text: Lesson 141. Sally's first train ride. Listen to the tape then answer this question. Why was the mother embarrassed?
lyrics.translation: 第141课。萨莉的第一次火车旅行。听录音，然后回答这个问题。为什么妈妈尴尬了？

lyrics.text: Last week my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's
lyrics.translation: 上周，我四岁的女儿萨莉被邀请参加一个儿童的

lyrics.text: party. I decided to take her by train. Sally was very excited because she had never traveled
lyrics.translation: 派对。我决定带她乘火车去。萨莉非常兴奋，因为她从未旅行过

lyrics.text: on a train before. She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.
lyrics.translation: 在火车上。她坐在窗户旁边，对她看到的一切问问题。

lyrics.text: Suddenly a middle-aged lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally. Hello little girl,
lyrics.translation: 突然，一位中年女士上了火车，坐在了萨莉的对面。你好，小女孩，

lyrics.text: she said. Sally did not answer but looked at her curiously. The lady was dressed in a blue
lyrics.translation: 她说。萨莉没有回答，而是好奇地看着她。那位女士穿着蓝色的衣服。

lyrics.text: coat and a large funny hat. After the train had left the station, the lady opened her
lyrics.translation: 外套和一顶大滑稽的帽子。火车离开车站后，这位女士打开了她的

lyrics.text: handbag and took out her powder compact. She then began to make up her face. Why are you
lyrics.translation: 她拿起手提包，拿出她的粉饼盒。然后她开始化妆。你为什么

lyrics.text: doing that? Sally asked. To make myself beautiful, the lady answered. She put away her compact
lyrics.translation: 为什么这么做？萨莉问。为了让自己更美丽，女士回答。她收起了她的粉饼盒。

lyrics.text: and smiled kindly. But you are still ugly, Sally said. Sally was amused but I was very
lyrics.translation: 然后和蔼地笑了。但你还是很丑，萨莉说。萨莉觉得很有趣，但我却非常
